00059 void ICMPHeader::GetChecksum(unsigned short &checksum) const
00060 {

00100 // ***** ICMPHeader ACCESSOR FUNCTIONS SPECIFIC TO TYPE *****
00101 void ICMPHeader::GetIphandIcmphEightBytes(const Packet &p, Buffer &data)
00102 {
00103   data.Clear();
00104 
00105   IPHeader iph = p.FindHeader(Headers::IPHeader);
00106   ICMPHeader icmph = p.FindHeader(Headers::ICMPHeader);
00107 
00108   // add the ip header and the 8 bytes of the icmp header
00109   data.AddFront(iph);
00110   data.AddBack(icmph);
00111 }
00112 void ICMPHeader::GetIphandEightBytes(const Packet &p, Buffer &data)
00113 {
00114   data.Clear();
00115   Packet pkt(p);
00116 
00117   IPHeader iph = p.FindHeader(Headers::IPHeader);
00118 
00119   // add the ip header and the first 8 bytes
00120   data.AddFront(iph);
00121   data.AddBack( pkt.GetPayload().ExtractFront(8));
00122 }
00123 void ICMPHeader::SetIphandEightBytes(Buffer &payload, Buffer &data)
00124 {
00125   payload = data;
00126 }

00198 // ***** ICMPHeader HELPER FUNCTIONS *****
00199 unsigned short ICMPHeader::ComputeChecksum(const Packet &p) const
00200 {
00201   size_t data_length = ((Packet&)p).GetPayload().GetSize();
00202   size_t total_length = ICMP_HEADER_LENGTH + data_length;
00203 
00204   unsigned short buffer[total_length];
00205   memset((char*)buffer, 0, 2*total_length);
00206 
00207   GetData((char*)&(buffer[0]), ICMP_HEADER_LENGTH, 0);
00208   ((Packet&)p).GetPayload().GetData((char*)&(buffer[ICMP_HEADER_LENGTH]), data_length, 0);
00209 
00210   return ~(OnesComplementSum(buffer, total_length));
00211 }
00212 
00213 bool ICMPHeader::IsCorrectChecksum(const Packet &p) const
00214 {
00215   unsigned short c;
00216   GetChecksum(c);
00217   if (c==0) {
00218     return true;
00219   } else {
00220     return ComputeChecksum(p)==0;
00221   }
00222 }
00223 
00224 void ICMPHeader::RecomputeChecksum(const Packet &p)
00225 {
00226   SetChecksum(0);
00227   unsigned short check=ComputeChecksum(p);
00228   SetChecksum(check);
00229 }
00230 
00231 void ICMPHeader::GetCurrentTimeInMilliseconds(unsigned long &current)
00232 {
00233   tm *timeptr;
00234   time_t time_value;
00235 
00236   // get time elapsed since 01/01/1970
00237   time_value = time(NULL);
00238 
00239   // convert to local time
00240   timeptr = localtime(&time_value);
00241 
00242   int conversion = 1000;
00243   int seconds = timeptr->tm_sec;
00244   int minutes = timeptr->tm_min;
00245   int hours = timeptr->tm_hour;
00246 
00247   // calculate milliseconds after midnight
00248   current = (long)((seconds*conversion) +
00249                    (minutes*60*conversion) +
00250                    (hours*60*60*conversion));
00251 }

00253 std::ostream & ICMPHeader::Print(std::ostream &os) const
00254 {
00255   unsigned char type, code;
00256   unsigned short checksum, identifier, seqnumber;
00257   GetType(type);
00258   GetCode(code);
00259   GetChecksum(checksum);
00260   GetIdentifier(identifier);
00261   GetSequenceNumber(seqnumber);
00262 
00263   os << "ICMPHeader(type=" << unsigned(type)
00264      << ", code=" << unsigned(code)
00265      << ", checksum=" << checksum
00266      << ", identifier=" << identifier
00267      << ", seqnumber=" << seqnumber
00268      << ")";
00269 
00270   return os;
00271 }

00276 // ***** ICMPPacket DECLARATIONS *****
00277 ICMPPacket::ICMPPacket() : Packet()

00280 ICMPPacket::ICMPPacket(const Packet &rhs) : Packet(rhs)
00281 {}
00282 
00283 ICMPPacket::ICMPPacket(const Packet &original,
00284                          const IPAddress &source, const IPAddress &destination,
00285                          const unsigned char &type, const unsigned char &code,
00286                          const unsigned short &identifier, const unsigned short &seqnumber,
00287                          Buffer &data) : Packet()
00288 {
00289   // create headers, modify data
00290   IPHeader iph;
00291   iph.SetTOS(0);
00292   iph.SetTotalLength(48);
00293   iph.SetProtocol(IP_PROTO_ICMP);
00294   iph.SetSourceIP(source);
00295   iph.SetDestIP(destination);
00296 
00297   ICMPHeader icmph;
00298   icmph.SetType(type, (*this));
00299 
00300   if (unsigned(type) == PARAMETER_PROBLEM)
00301   {
00302     // code is interpreted as the place where the error is
00303     icmph.SetPointer(code, (*this));
00304   }
00305   else if (unsigned(type) == TIMESTAMP_REQUEST)
00306   {
00307     unsigned long current_time;
00308     icmph.GetCurrentTimeInMilliseconds(current_time);
00309     icmph.SetOriginateTimestamp(data, current_time);
00310   }
00311 
00312   else if (unsigned(type) == ADDRESSMASK_REQUEST)
00313   {
00314     // set to broadcast ip
00315     iph.SetDestIP("IP_ADDRESS_BROADCAST");
00316   }
00317 
00318   payload = data;
00319   icmph.SetCode(code, (*this));
00320   icmph.SetIdentifier(identifier, (*this));
00321   icmph.SetSequenceNumber(seqnumber, (*this));
00322 
00323   PushHeader(icmph);
00324   PushHeader(iph);
00325 }

00328 ICMPPacket::ICMPPacket(const IPAddress &destination,
00329                          const unsigned char &type, const unsigned char &code,
00330                          const unsigned short &identifier, const unsigned short &seqnumber)
00331 {
00332   // create new payload
00333   unsigned short buffer[56];
00334   memset((char*)buffer, 0, 2*56);
00335   Buffer payload((char*)buffer, 56);
00336 
00337   ICMPPacket p((*this), getenv("MINET_IPADDR"), destination, type, code, identifier, seqnumber, payload);
00338   *this = p;
00339 }

00365 // error constructors
00366 ICMPPacket::ICMPPacket(const IPAddress &destination,
00367                          const unsigned char &type, const unsigned char &code,
00368                          const unsigned short &identifier, const unsigned short &seqnumber,
00369                          const Packet &p)
00370 {
00371   // extract necessary data
00372   Packet pkt(p);
00373   unsigned short buffer[56];
00374   memset((char*)buffer, 0, 2*56);
00375   Buffer data((char*)buffer, 56);
00376   ExtractIphandEightBytes(pkt, data);
00377 
00378   ICMPPacket error((*this), getenv("MINET_IPADDR"), destination, type, code, identifier, seqnumber, data);
00379   *this = error;
00380 }

00405   IPHeader iph = p.FindHeader(Headers::IPHeader);

00431 // ***** ICMPPacket HELPER FUNCTIONS *****
00432 void ICMPPacket::respond(const Packet &p)
00433 {
00434   ICMPPacket response(p);
00435   *this = response;
00436 
00437   // get header information
00438   EthernetHeader eh = PopHeader();
00439   IPHeader iph = FindHeader(Headers::IPHeader);
00440   ICMPHeader icmph = FindHeader(Headers::ICMPHeader);
00441 
00442   // reverse source/ destination ip addresses
00443   IPAddress source, destination;
00444   iph.GetSourceIP(source);  iph.GetDestIP(destination);
00445   iph.SetSourceIP(destination);  iph.SetDestIP(source);
00446 
00447   // handle response/error messaging
00448   unsigned char icmp_type;  unsigned char icmp_code;
00449   icmph.GetType(icmp_type);  icmph.GetCode(icmp_code);
00450 
00451   if ((unsigned(icmp_type) == ECHO_REQUEST) ||
00452       (unsigned(icmp_type) == TIMESTAMP_REQUEST) ||
00453       (unsigned(icmp_type) == ADDRESSMASK_REQUEST))
00454   {
00455     handle_response(iph, icmph, payload, icmp_type);
00456 
00457     // modify outgoing packet
00458     SetHeader(iph);
00459     SetHeader(icmph);
00460   }
00461 
00462   else if ((unsigned(icmp_type) == ECHO_REPLY) ||
00463            (unsigned(icmp_type) == TIMESTAMP_REPLY) ||
00464            (unsigned(icmp_type) == ADDRESSMASK_REPLY) ||
00465            (unsigned(icmp_type) == DESTINATION_UNREACHABLE) ||
00466            (unsigned(icmp_type) == SOURCE_QUENCH) ||
00467            (unsigned(icmp_type) == REDIRECT) ||
00468            (unsigned(icmp_type) == TIME_EXCEEDED) ||
00469            (unsigned(icmp_type) == PARAMETER_PROBLEM))
00470     handle_error(iph, icmph, payload, icmp_type);
00471 
00472   else
00473     std::cout << "Invalid ICMP Packet" << std::endl;
00474 }
00475 
00476 void ICMPPacket::respond(const RawEthernetPacket &rp)
00477 {
00478   Packet p(rp);
00479   p.ExtractHeaderFromPayload<EthernetHeader>(ETHERNET_HEADER_LEN);
00480   p.ExtractHeaderFromPayload<IPHeader>(IPHeader::EstimateIPHeaderLength(p));
00481   p.ExtractHeaderFromPayload<ICMPHeader>(ICMP_HEADER_LENGTH);
00482 
00483   respond(p);
00484 }
00485 
00486 void ICMPPacket::respond_in_ip_module(const Packet &p)
00487 {
00488   Packet pkt(p);
00489   pkt.ExtractHeaderFromPayload<ICMPHeader>(ICMP_HEADER_LENGTH);
00490   respond(pkt);
00491 }
00492 
00493 bool ICMPPacket::requires_reply()
00494 {
00495   return requires_response;
00496 }
00497 
00498 void ICMPPacket::handle_response(IPHeader &iph, ICMPHeader &icmph,
00499                                   Buffer &payload, unsigned char &icmp_type)
00500 {
00501   if (unsigned(icmp_type) == ECHO_REQUEST) {
00502     // change type to ECHO_REPLY
00503     icmph.SetType(ECHO_REPLY, (*this));
00504     requires_response = true;
00505   }
00506 
00507   else if (unsigned(icmp_type) == TIMESTAMP_REQUEST) {
00508     // change type to TIMESTAMP_REPLY
00509     icmph.SetType(TIMESTAMP_REPLY, (*this));
00510     unsigned long current_time;
00511     icmph.GetCurrentTimeInMilliseconds(current_time);
00512     icmph.SetOriginateTimestamp(payload, current_time);
00513   }
00514 
00515   else if (unsigned(icmp_type) == ADDRESSMASK_REQUEST) {
00516     // change type to ADDRESSMASK_REPLY
00517     icmph.SetType(ADDRESSMASK_REPLY, (*this));
00518     icmph.SetAddressMask(payload, "255.255.0.0");
00519     icmph.RecomputeChecksum( (*this));
00520     requires_response = true;
00521   }
00522 }
00523 
00524 void ICMPPacket::handle_error(IPHeader &iph, ICMPHeader &icmph, Buffer &payload, unsigned char &icmp_type)
00525 {
00526   if (unsigned(icmp_type) == REDIRECT) {
00527     ; // modify route table
00528   }
00529 
00530 
00531   requires_response = false;
00532 }

00537 // ***** GENERAL HELPER FUNCTIONS *****
00538 void DebugDump(Packet p)
00539 {
00540   //EthernetHeader eh = p.FindHeader(Headers::EthernetHeader);
00541   IPHeader iph = p.FindHeader(Headers::IPHeader);
00542   ICMPHeader icmph = p.FindHeader(Headers::ICMPHeader);
00543   Buffer payload = p.GetPayload();
00544 
00545   //eh.Print(std::cerr);  cerr << std::endl;
00546   iph.Print(std::cerr);     std::cerr << std::endl;
00547   icmph.Print(std::cerr);   std::cerr<< std::endl;
00548   p.Print(std::cerr);       std::cerr << std::endl;
00549   payload.Print(std::cerr); std::cerr << std::endl;
00550 }
